# CHANGELOG

## 3.0.0 - 2020-02-14
- Rename package name.

## 2.0.3 - 2020-02-14
- Improved Exception.

## 2.0.2 - 2019-09-11
- Supported `String`.

## 2.0.1 - 2019-08-15
- Supported `IteratorAggregate`.

## 2.0.0 - 2019-08-14
- Design `Request` as a standard `PsrRequest`.

## 1.0.10 - 2019-08-12
- Added `__toString` for `Response`.

## 1.0.9 - 2019-08-01
- Updated `Middleware`.

## 1.0.8 - 2019-07-29
- Supported `TransferStats`.

## 1.0.7 - 2019-07-27
- Improved request.

## 1.0.6 - 2019-07-23
- Trim key for parameter.

## 1.0.5 - 2019-07-23
- Supported default protocol.

## 1.0.4 - 2019-07-22
- Added `toArray()`.

## 1.0.3 - 2019-05-02
- Improved `Request`.

## 1.0.2 - 2019-05-02
- Added getHeader/getHeaders.

## 1.0.1 - 2019-04-02
- Improved design.

## 1.0.0 - 2019-05-02
- Initial release of the AlibabaCloud Tea Version 1.0.0 on Packagist See <https://github.com/aliyun/tea-php> for more information.
